description: I. Letter dated 25/04/2008 from Baroness Ashton of Upholland to Lord Blackwell regarding the European Union (Amendment) Bill. 18 p. II. Letter dated 08/05/2008 from Lord Blackwell to Baroness Ashton of Upholland responding to above letter regarding the European Union (Amendment) Bill. 3 p. III. Letter dated 30/05/2008 from Baroness Ashton of Upholland to Lord Blackwell responding to above letter regarding the European Union (Amendment) Bill 2007-08. 1 p.
department: Cabinet Office Leader of the House of Lords
